text: I'm supporting the Head of Data Science for a leading Financial Services Company that is looking for a
text.1: that brings a strong knowledge of Model Validation and/or model governance.

p.4: You would be responsible for reviewing model designs, performing independent validations and building challenger models. You will be actively collaborating with teams across the business.

strong: What we are looking for in candidates

p.7: Masters or PhD in Statistics/Applied Mathematics/DataScience
p.8: Technical strengths in Python and R, language and packages.
p.9: Experience in statistical modeling techniques (Linear/Logistic Regression, Survival Analysis, ETC)
p.10: Strong verbal and written communication skills
